comms_internal: See (Amfo 2007) for details. In general, comitative constructions seem to be syntactically symmetrical and indistinguishable from NP-coordination in Twi (Asante), unlike Fante. However, Kwadwo mentioned that in a situation where there is a question like “What is Kofi doing” one can answer with something like “Kofi re-kasa ne nanabarima”.

back_translation_en: ‘The woman gave birth to a son.’
‘The honey got mixed with the milk.’
